statement: SharePoint path length or sync conflicts
mitigation: Keep names short/ASCII; avoid huge caches; periodic sync checks

statement: Decisions buried in notes not logs
mitigation: Use decisions.csv every session; add note block linking to log
Centralize in 3-outputs/33-templates; copy, don't edit originals

statement: Efficiency claims are not evidenced by data
mitigation: Record assisted vs manual_est per task in staff_time.csv; review quarterly
